{"id":547073654,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1630388487,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"212 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/547073654/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"9.1 MB","code":"#pragma GCC optimize(\"Ofast\")\n#pragma GCC target(\"avx,avx2,fma\")\nstatic auto _ = []() {\n  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n  cin.tie(nullptr);\n  cout.tie(nullptr);\n  return 0;\n}();\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        if(n==1)return 1;\n        vector<int>dp(n+2,INT_MAX);\n        dp[1]=1;\n        dp[2]=2;\n        dp[3]=3;        \n        for(int i=4;i<=n;i++)\n        {\n            int t=sqrt(i);\n            if(t*t==i)\n            {\n                dp[i]=1;\n                continue;\n            }\n            for(int j=1;j*j<=i;j++)\n            {\n              dp[i]=min(dp[i],(dp[i-j*j]+1));\n              if(dp[i]==2)break;\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares"}
